Question
========

Below is a cross tabulation of 80 workers' gender and the number of working hours per week (rounded to whole hours) are given.

  ------- ----------- ------------- ------------- ----------- < 18 hours 18 - 32 hours 33 - 36 hours > 36 hours male 1 7 14 8 woman 6 18 21 5 ------- ----------- ------------- ------------- -----------

The relative cumulative frequency of the 18-32 hour class for all workers combined is equal to:

Answerlist
----------

* 0.40
* 31.25%
* 25
* 32

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.40: Correct
* 31.25%: Incorrect
* 25: Incorrect
* 32: Incorrect
